name: Starryica
description:
Starryica is a finding object game in spaceship. Made for gloal game jam 2021 in 48 hours. The player must find the lost objects and open doors. Developed for PC platform with Unity game engine.

We designed this game in Global Game Jam 2021. It is also fourth game jam i entered. The theme is "Lost And Found" and in Starryica we are finding lost objects for openning doors.

Everyone did a great job. Hope you like it. Have Fun!

-Controls-

W - Forward
A - Left
S - Back
D - Right
Mouse - Camera Movement

-Team-

Ahmet Yağız - Game Designer, Game Developer, Level Designer
Suat Nurbaki Civelek - Game Designer, 3D Artist, Level Designer
Nurdan Karaoğlu - 3D Artist, Level Designer
Hasan Can Doğan Aydınlık - 2D Artist, Animator
Orhun Özaydın - 3D Artist


Game Jam Format:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rPMjTEipuyjY848sq65lEQfI_dHT-vcA/view?usp=shari... (3,4G) for Global Game Jam Committee.
